sub_fields.message: This module will add a 2 column layout that contains a text area and an image. It will automatically reverse the layout of the columns with each new module. There is also an option to include a title that will appear either above the 2 column content or above the content section next to the image based on the "Title Placement" selection.

choices.top: Display Title Centered Above Image & Content
choices.content: Display Title Above Content, Beside Image

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: alt_content_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will be a full-width title appearing above this module.

sub_fields.message: The Basic Content module allows you to add a WYSIWYG editor and an optional title field.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: basic_content_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will be a full-width title appearing above this module.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: feature_image_block_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will be a full-width title appearing above this module.

sub_fields.label: Video Guidelines
sub_fields.message: When gathering an embed code from Vimeo please follow the guidelines below. Ensure the following fields are CHECKED: - Responsive Ensure the following fields are UNCHECKED: - Fixed size - Autoplay this video - Loop this video

sub_fields.label: Embed Code
sub_fields.name: video_embed
sub_fields.instructions: Copy and paste in the embed code for vimeo following the guidelines above.

sub_fields.label: Order
sub_fields.name: stats_trio_order
sub_fields.instructions: The first section will appear below the title, then a horizontal line will be used, and then the second section will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Reference
sub_fields.name: stats_trio_stat_reference
sub_fields.instructions: Optional reference number for beside content (to relate with references section below).

sub_fields.label: References
sub_fields.name: stats_trio_references
sub_fields.instructions: Optional area to place content references for individual stats.
